backlog.title: Design and implement UI for activity logging form
backlog.description: As a user, I want an intuitive interface to log my daily activities for easy health tracking.

backlog.title: Create API endpoint for saving activity data
backlog.description: As a developer, I need to create an API endpoint to save user activity data securely in the backend.

backlog.title: Implement data validation for activity logging
backlog.description: As a developer, I need to implement data validation on both frontend and backend to ensure data integrity.

backlog.title: Design and implement activity trends visualization
backlog.description: As a user, I want to see visualizations of my activity trends to better understand my progress.

backlog.title: Design and implement overall dashboard layout
backlog.description: As a user, I want a well-designed dashboard to view all my health metrics at a glance.

backlog.title: Create reusable card components for dashboard widgets
backlog.description: As a developer, I need to create reusable card components to display various health metrics on the dashboard.

backlog.title: Implement API endpoints for health metrics CRUD operations
backlog.description: As a developer, I need to create API endpoints for creating, reading, updating, and deleting health metrics data.

backlog.title: Create data aggregation service for health metrics
backlog.description: As a developer, I need to implement a service to aggregate health metrics data for efficient dashboard display.

backlog.title: Implement frontend components for health metrics display
backlog.description: As a user, I want to see my health metrics displayed in an easy-to-understand format on the dashboard.

backlog.title: Implement frontend component for food intake input
backlog.description: As a user, I want to be able to log my food intake easily through a user-friendly interface.

backlog.title: Create API endpoint for saving nutrition data
backlog.description: As a developer, I need to create an API endpoint to save user nutrition data securely in the backend.

backlog.title: Research and integrate basic food database API
backlog.description: As a developer, I need to research and integrate a basic food database API to provide nutritional information for logged food items.

backlog.title: Implement basic data validation for nutrition input
backlog.description: As a developer, I need to implement basic data validation for nutrition input to ensure data integrity.

backlog.title: Develop comprehensive test plan for new features
backlog.description: As a QA engineer, I need to develop a comprehensive test plan to ensure the quality of all new features.

backlog.title: Set up end-to-end testing environment
backlog.description: As a QA engineer, I need to set up an end-to-end testing environment to simulate real user scenarios.

backlog.title: Create automated test scripts for critical user journeys
backlog.description: As a QA engineer, I need to create automated test scripts to ensure the reliability of critical user journeys.

backlog.title: Perform manual testing of UI/UX for all new features
backlog.description: As a QA engineer, I need to perform manual testing to ensure the UI/UX meets design specifications and user expectations.

backlog.title: Conduct performance testing of API endpoints
backlog.description: As a QA engineer, I need to conduct performance testing of API endpoints to ensure they meet performance requirements.

backlog.title: Conduct security audit of existing codebase
backlog.description: As a senior developer, I need to conduct a security audit of the existing codebase to identify potential vulnerabilities.

backlog.title: Implement security improvements based on audit findings
backlog.description: As a senior developer, I need to implement security improvements based on the findings from the security audit.

backlog.title: Review and update authentication mechanisms
backlog.description: As a senior developer, I need to review and update the authentication mechanisms to ensure robust user security.
